messages.title: A Fresh Start
messages.content:
KEEP SCOTLAND IN THE UK AND THE UK IN EUROPE
LIBERAL DEMOCRATS ARE WINNING ACROSS THE UK

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Scottish Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Scottish Liberal Democrats will invest in healthcare and education.
The Scottish Liberal Democrats commit to addressing climate change.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate:
Nobody knows where Labour stand on Brexit or on Scottish independence.
The SNP want even more division with another independence referendum.

issues.brexitEurope: KEEP SCOTLAND IN THE UK AND THE UK IN EUROPE
issues.economy:
Rebuild our economy.
Labour stand on Brexit or on Scottish independence.
The Scottish Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
issues.environment:
Tackle the Climate Emergency.
The Scottish Liberal Democrats commit to addressing climate change.
issues.labourEmployment: The Scottish Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.

community.content: Jo Swinson is committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jo Swinson won the Liberal Democrat leadership in July. She became the first woman and the youngest person to hold the position. Jo was Britain’s youngest MP when she won her seat in 2005 in East Dunbartonshire. As a Business Minister between 2012-2015, she successfully introduced shared parental leave and clamped down on unscrupulous payday loan lenders.

politicalExperience.achievements: Introduced shared parental leave and clamped down on unscrupulous payday loan lenders.

examples: KEEP SCOTLAND IN THE UK AND THE UK IN EUROPE
Nobody knows where Labour stand on Brexit or on Scottish independence.
The SNP want even more division with another independence referendum.
The Scottish Liberal Democrats will stop the division with another referendum.
The Scottish Liberal Democrats commit to addressing climate change.

personalStories.story: As a Business Minister between 2012-2015, she successfully introduced shared parental leave and clamped down on unscrupulous payday loan lenders.

examples: Nobody knows where Labour stand on Brexit or on Scottish independence.
The SNP want even more division with another independence referendum.
The Conservatives want to force through an old division on Brexit.
Nobody knows where Labour stand on Brexit or on Scottish independence. They won’t stop keeping change away.
The SNP want even more division with another independence referendum. They won’t stop the division in our country.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Jo Swinson is committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe.
